metadata.name: UAC Bypass Using .NET Code Profiler on MMC
metadata.comment: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using .NET Code Profiler and mmc.exe DLL hijacking (UACMe 39)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\temp\\\\pe386.dll')))

output.summary: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using .NET Code Profiler and mmc.exe DLL hijacking (UACMe 39)
